templates.name: Cash Flow Analysis
templates.description: Comprehensive cash flow analysis and forecasting template

sections.title: Current Cash Position
sections.description: Analyze current cash position and trends
questions: What is the current cash balance?
What are the main sources of cash inflow?
What are the primary cash outflow categories?
How has cash flow changed over the past 6 months?

sections.title: Cash Flow Projections
questions: What are the expected cash inflows for the next 12 months?
What are the anticipated cash outflows?
Are there any seasonal variations to consider?
What are the key assumptions in the projections?

sections.title: Risk Assessment
sections.description: Identify potential cash flow risks and mitigation strategies
questions: What are the biggest risks to cash flow?
How can the business prepare for cash flow shortfalls?
What contingency plans are in place?
How can cash flow be optimized?

templates.name: Profitability Analysis
templates.description: Deep dive into business profitability and margin analysis

sections.title: Revenue Analysis
questions: What are the main revenue sources?
How has revenue grown over time?
What are the most profitable products/services?
Are there any seasonal revenue patterns?

sections.title: Cost Analysis
sections.description: Break down and analyze all costs
questions: What are the fixed vs variable costs?
Which costs have increased the most?
Are there any cost reduction opportunities?
How do costs compare to industry benchmarks?

sections.title: Margin Analysis
questions: What is the gross profit margin?
What is the net profit margin?
How do margins compare to industry standards?
What factors are affecting profitability?

templates.name: Budget Planning & Forecasting
templates.description: Comprehensive budget planning and financial forecasting

sections.title: Historical Analysis
questions: What were the revenue trends over the past 3 years?
How have expenses changed over time?
What were the key drivers of growth?
What were the major cost increases?

sections.title: Revenue Planning
sections.description: Plan and forecast revenue for the upcoming year
questions: What are the revenue targets for next year?
What growth assumptions are being made?
Are there any new revenue streams planned?
How will seasonality affect revenue?

sections.title: Expense Planning
sections.description: Plan and budget for all expenses
questions: What are the fixed expenses for next year?
What variable expenses are expected?
Are there any major capital expenditures planned?
How will inflation affect expenses?

sections.title: Cash Flow Planning
sections.description: Plan cash flow and working capital needs
questions: What are the cash flow requirements?
When will cash flow be tight?
What financing might be needed?
How can cash flow be optimized?

templates.name: KPI Dashboard Setup
templates.description: Set up key performance indicators and monitoring dashboard

sections.title: KPI Selection
sections.description: Identify and select key performance indicators
questions: What are the most important metrics for this business?
Which KPIs align with business goals?
What data is readily available?
How frequently should KPIs be measured?

sections.title: Dashboard Design
sections.description: Design the KPI dashboard layout and structure
questions: Who will use the dashboard?
What information is most important?
How should the data be visualized?
What level of detail is needed?

sections.title: Data Collection
sections.description: Set up systems for collecting and updating KPI data
questions: Where will the data come from?
How will data be collected and updated?
Who is responsible for data entry?
How will data quality be ensured?

templates.name: Tax Planning & Optimization
templates.description: Comprehensive tax planning and optimization strategy

sections.title: Current Tax Situation
sections.description: Analyze current tax position and obligations
questions: What are the current tax obligations?
What deductions are being claimed?
Are there any tax credits available?
What is the effective tax rate?

sections.title: Tax Optimization
questions: What deductions are being missed?
Are there any tax credits available?
Can expenses be timed for better tax treatment?
Are there any tax-advantaged investments?

sections.title: Compliance Planning
sections.description: Plan for tax compliance and deadlines
questions: What are the key tax deadlines?
What documentation is needed?
Are there any estimated tax payments required?
What records need to be maintained?

templates.name: Business Valuation Analysis
templates.description: Comprehensive business valuation and value enhancement

sections.title: Financial Analysis
questions: What is the historical financial performance?
What are the key financial ratios?
How does performance compare to industry standards?
What are the growth trends?

sections.title: Market Analysis
sections.description: Analyze market position and competitive landscape
questions: What is the market size and growth?
Who are the main competitors?
What is the competitive advantage?
What are the market trends?

sections.title: Value Drivers
sections.description: Identify key value drivers and enhancement opportunities
questions: What drives the business value?
What are the key assets?
What are the growth opportunities?
What risks affect value?

categories.name: Financial Analysis
categories.description: Templates for analyzing financial performance and health

categories.name: Planning
categories.description: Templates for budgeting, forecasting, and strategic planning

categories.name: Performance Management
categories.description: Templates for setting up KPIs and performance monitoring

categories.name: Tax Planning
categories.description: Templates for tax optimization and compliance

categories.name: Strategic Planning
categories.description: Templates for strategic analysis and business valuation
